```{r}
# Function to print the Fibonacci sequence using a loop
print_fibonacci <- function(n) {
a <- 0
b <- 1

cat("Fibonacci Sequence: ")
for (i in 1:n) {
	cat(a, " ")
	next_num <- a + b
	a <- b
	b <- next_num
}
}

# Example usage
number_of_terms <- 10
print_fibonacci(number_of_terms)
```
